Key Match Events: Lungi Ngidi took a four-wicket haul
David Miller finished unbeaten on 59 off 46 to see South Africa over the line
Pre-Game Insights: India expected the pitch to have something in it with the weather around
South Africa were watching the games that were played here and saw Pakistan bowl and it helped
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said that South Africa played well in the end and India were not good enough on the field
Temba Bavuma said that they backed themselves and kept improving
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was such that the wicket can come any time for the seamers
India have to beat Bangladesh by a fairly big margin in their last match to keep their net run rate above the rest of the chasing pack
